name: "She"Waisted Short Cincher/Workout Cincher
description:
***This cincher comes in HOT PINK, LIME GREEN, BLUE & PURPLE***

Our corsets are perfect for reshaping the body and using during workouts!  When worn 24 hours a day you can train your waist to conform to the new hourglass shape.  We recommend a minimum of 8-10 hours.  This midsection makeover latex core is our most popular prescription for post-baby bodies and poochie bellies.  Slimming and trimming while boosting your bust.

Wearing our "She"Waisted Short Cincher corset for 8-10 hours a day for 30 days can give you sustained reduction of 4-8 inches in the midsection.  What's the secret?  Like all slimming garments, the corset utilizes the science of compression to support long-term slimming.  The latex core stimulates thermal activity and perspiration, mobilizing fat and toxins.  You'll see results as soon as you put it on.  Add time, plus a healthy diet and active lifestyle and you're going to love the edge the "She"Waisted Short Cincher gives you.  

IMPORTANT** When your corset arrives (It may appear your is too small) you WILL need help getting into the corset.

--You pull and your help hooks the corset in the 1st row of hooks, after hours, days or weeks (depending on comfort level) you should be able to get to 2nd hook and put corset on yourself without help!
NOW YOU'RE RESHAPING & MOLDING HAS BEGUN

RESULTS

*Midsection control
*Increased thermal activity
*Loss of inches reported (2-4 inches in 30 days)
*Mobilizes fat cells
*Stimulates perspiration

FEATURES

*Latex band
*Hook-and-eye closures
*FlexiBoning Cotton lining

ALL OF OUR PRODUCTS ARE AUTHENTIC & IMPORTED FROM COLUMBIA 

ALL ITEMS SHIP USPS PRIORITY MAIL


******NO EXCHANGES OR REFUNDS******

name: "She"Waisted V-Bra
description:
This is the hottest item on the market. The Deep Plunge V-Bra with insert Pockets has convertible straps and can be worn as conventional, halter or criss-cross. It is perfect for prom dresses, evening gowns, weddings, bridesmaids dresses, casual and more. It is slightly padded with push up and they are packaged nicely in a box.

The V bra that lifts and shapes under those plunging necklines. 
Medium padded bra cups make this bra one of our best to enhance your cleavage.

Pockets in deep plunge bra cups allow you to insert silicone pads for extreme cleavage.Convertible straps can be worn as conventional, halter, or criss-cross

name: "She"Waisted Backless Shaper-Bikini
description:
If you’re looking for shaping and smoothing under something backless or strapless, we have the backless shapewear for you! The Backless Body Shaper with Bikini Bottom by Fullness shapewear is wonderful as an everyday option or even when you have something more formal that needs a great foundation. A mesh tummy control panel gives extra shaping to the midsection. The bodysuit features a plunging back so it won’t show under most neck and back lines.

One of the nicest features of this garment are the built in underwire cups which include removable push up pads. These pads round and shape the bust and create gorgeous cleavage without an additional bra. Wear your shaper backless, criss-cross, conventional or halter. It’s the perfect start for prom dresses or just a dressy night out. This garment finishes in a soft panty bottom with a convenient hook-and-eye opening. Shape your way with the Backless Body Shaper with Bikini Bottom by Fullness.

RESULTS 
All-torso smoothing 
Light midsection control 
Soft bust support 
Volume added to the bosom 
FEATURES 
Backless body suit 
Convertible straps 
Lightly padded underwire cups 
Removable push-up pads 
Panty bottom 
Hook-and-eye bathroom opening 
Materials: 95% Nylon, 5% Spandex

*** No Exchanges no Returns ****

Perfect for: Camisoles, prom dresses, cocktail dresses, evening gowns, wedding and bridesmaids dresses and more.

ALL ITEMS SHIP USPS PRIORITY MAIL

name: "She"Waisted Perfect Butt Lifter Thermal Pants Shaper
description:
Unlike other heavier shapers, the hosiery weight of this shaper's stretch fabric is a great balance of control and comfort, slimming without adding a lot of weight or increase in body temperature.  A special weave in the legs of the garment provides additional thigh control and holds the garment in place.  Inside this lightweight fabric, the Perfect Butt Thermal Pants the natural latex tummy panel provides extra slimming and activates thermal activity in your core.  This thermal activity supports slimming by increasing perspiration in the area, mobilizing fat and toxins, which maximizes the work your muscles already do.  The open bottom design of this garment creates a lifting effect that rounds the rear into a perfect shape.  Now you don' have to settle for a slimming short that comes up short when it's time  and to enhance your bottom. Light,  lovely and always in control, from your belly to your booty you're going to love the way you look in the Perfect Butt Thermal Pants.

RESULTS
*Rounded rear
*Comfortable control
*Lightweight shaping
*Slimmed belly
* Thigh trimming

FEATURES
*Open bottom design
*Thigh trimming band
*Thermal tummy control panel
*Hosiery weight shaping

name: Defining Gel
description:
Defining Gel is an intensive skin care gel that deeply hydrates while firming areas such as the abdomen, back, legs, and upper arms. When used regularly, Defining Gel minimizes the appearance of cellulite and varicose veins. 

• Minimizes cellulite appearance
• Diminishes appearance of varicose veins 
• Improves skin texture & tightness
• Softens and hydrates
• Made with natural ingredients

name: Stretch Mark Cream
description:
This body cream not only minimizes the appearance of stretch marks and other scars, it offers luxurious moisture that multi-tasks. A non-greasy formula, Stretch Mark & Moisturizing Cream packs a powerful combo of botanicals to help restore the skin's youthful glow, while balancing skin tone to minimize the appearance of stretch marks and other skin scarring.
• Non-greasy body cream
• Minimizes the appearance of stretch marks or other scars
• Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
• Promotes youthful-looking skin
• Rejuvenates and hydrates
• Helps even skin tone

Directions: Apply both morning and evening over cleansed skin with a gentle massage until cream is completely absorbed.

name: Ultimate Body Applicator
description:
Expect "ultimate" results with this amazing 45-minute body Applicator! The Ultimate Body Applicator is a non-woven cloth wrap that has been infused with a powerful, botanically-based formula to deliver maximum tightening, toning, and firming results where applied to the skin.
•Tightens, tones, & firms 
•Minimizes cellulite appearance 
•Improves skin texture & tightness 
•Mess-free and simple to use 
•Results in as little as 45 minutes 
•Progressive results over 72 hours 
•Made with natural ingredients

name: Thermo Fit
description:
Fire up your metabolism with this naturally based, thermogenic weight loss formula! Powered by the antioxidant superfood acai berry and the metabolism-boosting properties of Capsimax® (red hot pepper blend), Ultimate ThermoFit helps to:
•Thermogenic weight loss formula
• Antioxidant benefits of acai berry
• Promotes increased calorie burning
• Helps boost metabolic rate
• Reduces appetite
• Provides energy

name: Fat Fighters
description:
Have a sweet tooth? A carb craving? It's okay to indulge every once in a while when you have Advanced Formula Fat Fighter with Carb Inhibitors!

Simply take Fat Fighter up to an hour after eating, and it will absorb some of the fat and carbohydrates from your food so that your body doesn't. Powered by NeOpuntia™ (a naturally based ingredient made from the "prickly pear" cactus) and the It Works! proprietary blend, Advanced Formula Fat Fighter delivers dynamic, clinically tested results for both men and women.
• Blocks some of the fat & carbs from meals
• Helps balance healthy blood glucose level and reduce cravings
• Designed to be taken up to an hour after meals
• Cactus-based formula
• Does not contain shellfish

Directions: Adults take 2 tablets during or up to 60 minutes after each large meal

name: Greens On The Go
description:
Alkalize, energize, and detoxify wherever you go with Greens on the Go™ in a new sweet berry flavor. This convenient, single serving packet of Greens is now powered by an even better pH-balancing blend, supercharged with an acidity-fighting combination of magnesium and potassium for even more alkalizing properties. The addition of a cutting-edge probiotic helps you maintain that healthy balance by keeping your digestive system regular and toxins flowing out.

With 8+ servings of fruits and vegetables and a blend of 38 herbs and nutrient-rich superfoods, Greens provides naturally occurring, bioavailable vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, phytonutrients, and enzymes to give your already well-balanced diet a nutritional boost.

Just mix, shake, and take your Greens on the Go!   

 
•Detoxify, alkalize, and promote pH balance within the body 
•Acidity-fighting magnesium and potassium blend 
•Cutting-edge probiotic support for digestive health 
•38 herbs and nutrient-rich superfoods 
•8+ servings of fruits and vegetables in every packet 
•Free radical-fighting antioxidants 
•Great-tasting berry flavor 


****Also in orange flavor****

name: Regular
description:
This life-changing, naturally based supplement is designed to aid in elimination and restore and support normal colon function naturally. Using Regular ensures daily removal of toxins and waste material and offers a gentle way to cleanse the colon. 
• Promotes regular colon function
• Supports liver and gallbladder function
• Safe and gentle (no urgency effect)
• Cleanses toxins from the colon
• Balances colon pH level
